How influential is Journal of Vacuum Science & Technology an Official Journal of the American Vacuum Society B, Microelectronics Processing and Phenomena in terms of citations?

Based on the citation analysis of 2,793 articles Journal of Vacuum Science & Technology an Official Journal of the American Vacuum Society B, Microelectronics Processing and Phenomena has published so far, 3% of its articles have received no citation at all. 127 articles (about 4% of the total articles) have received only one citation. 19.23% of the articles (112) have received over 100 citations.
